name: QrEasy
summary: One-line QR generation helpers with sane defaults.

methods.name: Encode
methods.summary: Encodes a payload into a CodeGlyphX.QrCode with defaults.

methods.name: EncodeAuto
methods.summary: Detects a payload type and encodes it into a CodeGlyphX.QrCode.

methods.name: Encode
methods.summary: Encodes a payload with embedded defaults.

methods.name: EvaluateSafety
methods.summary: Evaluates QR art safety for a payload and options.

methods.name: EvaluateSafety
methods.summary: Evaluates QR art safety for a payload with embedded defaults.

methods.name: RenderPng
methods.summary: Renders a QR code as PNG.

methods.name: RenderPngAuto
methods.summary: Detects a payload type and renders a QR code as PNG.

methods.name: RenderPngToStream
methods.summary: Renders a QR code as PNG to a stream.

methods.name: RenderPngToFile
methods.summary: Renders a QR code as PNG and writes it to a file.

methods.name: RenderPngToFile
methods.summary: Renders a QR code as PNG and writes it to a file for a payload with embedded defaults.

methods.name: RenderPng
methods.summary: Renders a QR code as PNG for a payload with embedded defaults.

methods.name: RenderPngToStream
methods.summary: Renders a QR code as PNG to a stream for a payload with embedded defaults.
